block_comment: This block of Verilog code manages the assignment of the 'fix_bl_value' based on certain conditions. On a positive clock edge, if either the reset input 'rst_i' is active/high, or if the 'FAMILY' parameter is set to "VIRTEX6", then 'fix_bl_value' is fixed to the constant 'FIXED_BL_VALUE'. Furthermore, if neither of those conditions is met, yet the 'vio_modify_enable' signal is high, then 'fix_bl_value' takes the value of 'vio_fixed_bl_value'.
